```{r}
library("googlesheets4")
library("tidyverse")
library("tinytable")

googlesheets4::gs4_auth()



# Read scores data

goalies <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JJsE9A4X5NXep4POTjm9Fctvvl1b5T-5fzA1ZRSXDi0/edit?usp=drive_link")

nplay <- nrow(goalies)
idx_odd <- seq(1,nplay,2)
idx_evn <- seq(2,nplay,2)




```




```{r}
#| warning: false



goalies |> 
  # tt( theme="striped" ) |> 
  tt() |> 
  style_tt( i=0, background="skyblue3" ) |> 
  style_tt( i=idx_odd, background="white", color="grey20" ) |> 
  style_tt( i=idx_evn, background="grey90", color="grey20" ) |> 
  style_tt( align="c" ) |> 
  theme_html( portable=TRUE )


```
